useCase.name: Upload Archival Collections

preconditions.precondition: Archivist is signed in to the system

useCase.trigger: User wants to upload archival collections

mainSequence.step: Archivist signs in to the system
Authentication system verifies credentials and grants access
Upload interface saves metadata and access rights
File storage system stores files in the archive
Database adds new entries to the archival collections
Upload success message is displayed to Archivist
Notification system sends notifications to donor representatives
